alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 22 at 6:25PM CDT until March 22 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LIMESTONE AND CENTRAL MORGAN COUNTIES... At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Decatur, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Athens, Hartselle, Priceville, Falkville, Tanner, Huntsville International Airport, Somerville, Mooresville and Belle Mina. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
